question: Write a letter to friend to inform them of a celebration you are having for a recent job promotion. Include information about- The promotion- The celebration- Their accomodation
text: How are you? I hope you and your family are fine at this uncertain time. It has been ages since we went out together.
Actually, I am writing because I have great news for you. Do you remember, I have told you my job was incredibly stressful and challenging lately due to a project I was in charge of?
Anyway, it paid off as my team successfully completed it, and as a result, I was promoted. I have received the position of the head of the Almaty city branch of our company.

Thus, I decided to celebrate my promotion and gather all my closest friends together because without your support it would not be possible to accomplish it. The celebrating party will be at my summer house in California next weekend. I would like to invite you and your wife to join the party and stay at my house for the whole weekend. You will stay in a separate bedroom on the second floor with a stunning view of the ocean. Frankly speaking, I have made a renovation in the house and I wish you to see a new design and decoration.
I am looking forward to hearing from you soon. I hope you will be able to come and spend time with me.
